full_summary:
===============

**Multi-disciplinary A&E Consultant Services Source List**

**Tender Reference:** MX-43068472902

**Solicitation:** WW24SL01

**Publication Date:** March 19, 2024

**Closing Date and Time:** April 29, 2024, 14:00:00

**Description:**

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites qualified consulting firms to establish a Source List (SL) for the provision of multi-disciplinary architecture and engineering services at 3CDSB Wainwright, Alberta. The SL will be used for various types of projects, including:

* Building renovations and new constructions
* Mechanical system upgrades and new installations
* Electrical system upgrades and new installations
* Landscaping and minor civil design
* Structural assessment and design
* Building envelope design and upgrade
* Demolition projects

**Scope of Work:**

The selected consultants will be required to provide professional services for a period of one (1) year, with a maximum estimated value of $400,000.00. If mutually agreed, the SL may be extended for up to one (1) additional year and increased by $400,000.00.

**Requirements:**

* Hold a valid DOS Reliability, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
* Comply with the requirements of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Chapter Nineteen of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-GPA)

**Eligibility Criteria:**

* Firms must demonstrate the necessary expertise and resources to provide the required services
* Firms must be able to meet the security requirements as stated in the RFP documents

**Instructions to Proponents:**

* Firms interested in submitting their proposals must access the MERX Electronic Bidding System and submit their Abbreviated Proposals on or before the closing date and time
* Questions must be directed ONLY to the point of contact identified in this advertisement

**Contact Information:**

* Point of Contact: Jacob Lachapelle, Defence Construction Canada
* Email: jacob.lachapelle@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-550-4560

**Documents:**

* Tender documents are available on http://www.merx.com
* Fees may apply; refer to https://www.merx.com/public/pricing for
